page.title: 11DR. RAVENSDALE
page.content: Dr.Ravensdale lives in a thatched house at 21 High Street.The thatch on the roof of his house lasts for 51 years.The ridge in the thatched roof has to be changed 3 times out of the 51 years the thatch lasts.Dr. Ravensdale played a few sports when he was younger which are Rugby,Football, Squash and Cricket.He thought Landbeach was very nice because the old buildings are attractive and the people in the village were very nice. Several hundred people live in Landbeach.He is retired so now he writes books on the history of Landbeach.A program had him in which he directed.He is also going to write a book about the Domesday Book.
